name: CourseGuide Inc.
description: Provider of an online guide platform designed to be used for the search and discovery of Web development boot camps. The company's online guide platform provides a host of data points and student reviews, enabling coders to find schools for their needs and desired outcomes.
one_liner: Provider of an online guide platform designed to be used for the search and discovery of Web development boot camps. The company's online guide platform provides a host of data points and student reviews, enabling coders to find schools for their needs and desired outcomes.
